sentences.en: A copy of the report is available for you to peruse at your leisure.
sentences.cn: 现有一份报告，供你闲暇时细读。

sentences.en: Applicants should peruse the instructions carefully.
sentences.cn: 申请人须详细阅读本说明。

sentences.en: In all cases the results came quickly and were easy to peruse.
sentences.cn: 人们很快就能得到搜索结果，并能简单地读出这些结果。
